author: Staff Reporter
text:
In a joint raid conducted by the sleuths of Video Piracy Cell, Salem, along with Enforcers of Intellectual Property Rights (EIPR), Chennai, duplicate products that were being stored and sold under the brand name of a reputed company was seized here on Thursday.

On a tip off by the private investigating agency EIPR, the team raided the shops in the Veerapandiyar Nagar, near New Bus Stand, and found two wholesale shops selling the products.

Huge quantities of bags were seized. Based on a complaint, the police registered a case under Section 51 and 65 of Copyright Act and arrested Jaishreeram, Naresh Kumar and Hussain.
title: Three arrested
